title: FYP Project
section: LiDAR and AI-Integrated Home Surveillance System for Elderly Safety
text:
LiDAR and AI-Integrated Home Surveillance System for Elderly Safety

Project Summary
The proposed project aims to develop an intelligent home surveillance system that combines LiDAR (Light Detection and Ranging) sensors with AI-based activity recognition models to monitor and enhance the safety of elderly individuals living alone.


Objectives

Utilize LiDAR for precise indoor environment mapping and motion tracking.
Develop AI models to detect critical events such as:

Falls
Unusual inactivity
Hazardous movements (e.g., wandering into unsafe areas)

Integrate real-time alert notifications to caregivers or family members via a secure dashboard or mobile app.



Key Technologies

LiDAR sensors for non-intrusive, privacy-preserving spatial awareness.
Computer vision and deep learning models (e.g., LSTM, CNN) for human activity recognition.
Edge AI deployment for low-latency, real-time monitoring.
Optional: Fusion with IoT devices (e.g., wearables, smart home sensors).



Motivation
With the global aging population rising, there is a growing demand for intelligent, privacy-respecting, and non-invasive surveillance systems to ensure the well-being of elderly individuals‚Äîespecially those who live independently.


üîß Tools and Platforms

Python / R for data processing and AI modeling
TensorFlow / PyTorch for deep learning
ROS / Arduino / Raspberry Pi for sensor integration (if applicable)
Shiny / Quarto for building an interactive monitoring dashboard

title: Reflections
text:
Ô∏è What is the GenAI tool you have used? Why did you choose it?
The GenAI tool I have used is ChatGPT. I chose this tool because it is known for its versatility, ease of use, and strong support for coding, writing, and explanation of technical concepts. It also integrates well with R and Python, which are relevant to my coursework in Applied Artificial Intelligence.


How did the GenAI tool help you in completing the assessment (with examples)?
ChatGPT helped me in several ways during my assessments:

Clarifying Concepts: When I was unsure about how to format a Quarto website or configure a YAML file, ChatGPT explained it clearly and gave me ready-to-use examples.
Code Assistance: It provided code snippets for adding pages like about.qmd and funfacts.qmd, and helped troubleshoot issues such as broken navbars.
Content Generation: For example, it helped me draft personal introductions for my funfacts.qmd and ideas for my FYP project involving LiDAR and AI.
Reflection Writing: Like this very document‚ÄîChatGPT helped structure and phrase my thoughts into coherent sections.



What do you think are beneficial about the tool?
Some benefits of using ChatGPT include:

Fast and personalized support, especially for technical tasks.
Helps overcome writer‚Äôs block by suggesting content or phrasing.
Saves time by generating clean and accurate code or explanations.
Improves understanding through interactive clarification of complex topics.



What do you think are challenging about the tool?
Despite its benefits, there are a few challenges:

Over-reliance: It‚Äôs easy to become dependent on the tool instead of solving problems independently.
Inaccuracy: Occasionally, it may give outdated or incorrect suggestions, so double-checking is necessary.
Lack of context: If prompts are unclear or vague, the responses might miss the mark.



How do you think GenAI tools will assist you for your future study or work?
In the future, I believe GenAI tools will:

Assist with research by summarizing papers and generating code for experiments.
Support learning by explaining new concepts interactively.
Boost productivity at work by helping write reports, debug code, or brainstorm ideas.
Enable rapid prototyping of AI solutions, especially when integrating new technologies like LiDAR or IoT.

Overall, GenAI tools like ChatGPT will become a valuable co-pilot in both academic and professional settings.

title: fun facts
text:
Personal Introduction
Outside of academics, I really enjoy staying active and one of my favorite hobbies is playing volleyball.


Academic Interests
Among the modules I‚Äôve taken so far, Math 1 and Math 2 have been my absolute favorites. I‚Äôve enjoyed the logical thinking and problem-solving involved, and they‚Äôve given me a strong foundation for understanding AI and data science concepts more deeply.


Looking Ahead
I‚Äôm excited to continue exploring the intersections of math, AI, and real-world applications as I progress through the program.
